title: Good Good Father
lyrics: Good Good Father
Anthony Brown | Pat Barrett Tempo - 48 | Time - 6/8
VERSE 1
I've heard a thousand stories of what they think You’re like
But I've heard the tender whisper of love in the dead of night
You tell me that You’re pleased and that I'm never a - lone
CHORUS
You're a good good Father it's who You are
It's who You are it's who You are
And I'm loved by You it's who I am
It's who I am it's who I am
VERSE 2
I've seen many searching for answers far and wide
But I know we're all searching for answers only You pro - vide
Because You know just what we need before we say a word
BRIDGE
You are perfect in all of Your ways
You are perfect in all of Your ways
You are perfect in all of Your ways to us
INSTRUMENTAL
VERSE 3
Love so unde - niable I can hardly speak
Peace so unex - plainable I can hardly think
As You call me deeper still as You call me deeper still
As You call me deeper still into love love love
CCLI Song # 7036612

raw_text:
Good Good Father
Key - D
Anthony Brown | Pat Barrett Tempo - 48 | Time - 6/8
VERSE 1
D Dsus D5 D Dsus D5
I've heard a thousand stories of what they think You’re like
D Dsus D5 D Dsus D5
But I've heard the tender whisper of love in the dead of night
G2(no3) D/F# Em7 A(4)
You tell me that You’re pleased and that I'm never a - lone
CHORUS
G2 D
You're a good good Father it's who You are
Em7 A(4)
It's who You are it's who You are
G2 D
And I'm loved by You it's who I am
Em7 A(4)
It's who I am it's who I am
VERSE 2
D Dsus D5 D Dsus D5
I've seen many searching for answers far and wide
D Dsus D5 D Dsus D5
But I know we're all searching for answers only You pro - vide
G2(no3) D/F# Em7 A(4)
Because You know just what we need before we say a word
BRIDGE
G2 Bm7
You are perfect in all of Your ways
Em7 D
You are perfect in all of Your ways
G2 Bm7 A(4)
You are perfect in all of Your ways to us
INSTRUMENTAL
||: D Dsus D5 | D Dsus D5 :||
VERSE 3
D Dsus D5 D Dsus D5
Love so unde - niable I can hardly speak
D Dsus D5 D Dsus D5
Peace so unex - plainable I can hardly think
G2(no3) D/F# Em7 D/F#
As You call me deeper still as You call me deeper still
G2(no3) D/F# Em7 A(4)
As You call me deeper still into love love love
